mapper.select: SELECT m.perms_mark FROM sys_perms m LEFT JOIN sys_role_perms rp ON rp.rp_perms_id=m.perms_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.rp_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.ur_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.ur_user_id=u.user_id WHERE u.user_code=#{code}

SELECT m.perms_mark FROM sys_perms m LEFT JOIN sys_role_perms rp ON rp.rp_perms_id=m.perms_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.rp_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_student_role sr ON sr.sr_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_student s ON sr.sr_student_id=s.student_id WHERE s.student_code=#{code}
SELECT * FROM sys_perms WHERE perms_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR perms_mark LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT * FROM sys_perms m LEFT JOIN sys_role_perms rp ON rp.rp_perms_id=m.perms_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.rp_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.ur_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.ur_user_id=u.user_id WHERE u.user_id=#{id} GROUP BY m.perms_id

SELECT * FROM sys_perms m LEFT JOIN sys_role_perms rp ON rp.rp_perms_id=m.perms_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.rp_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_student_role sr ON sr.sr_role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_student s ON sr.sr_student_id=s.student_id WHERE s.student_id=#{id} GROUP BY m.perms_id
